staxel.village.character.dialogue.MaxBes: A few years ago, I took my name out of the running for mayor.
I felt like my time had passed, that I had no more to contribute.
To be honest, I really only wanted to retire and live in peace.
I took it as a sign and redoubled my efforts!
I long for retirement again...but I know it will just be snatched away.
As long as there is no one to follow after me, they'll just re-elect me every time...
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! Thinking on it a bit more...
I do believe you'd make a wonderful mayor!
You have a bit more training to go before we ever reach that day, but I hope I can give you the chance!
That was an excellent harvest festival, was it not?
I hope we can collaborate on far more festivals in the future!
